wikipedia_page.main: Jim Beattie (born 16 February 1973 in Glasgow) is a Scottish former professional footballer, who played for St Mirren, Ayr United and Albion Rovers in the Scottish Football League. He also played abroad in Finland for Premier League club MyPa.

response: James or Jim Beattie may refer to:
*Jim Beattie (musician), Scottish musician, formerly of Primal Scream
